name.str: Evocation Grimoire: The Rites of Evocation
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: The Rites of Evocation

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This is a ritual preparation making it easier to control the creature when it arrives.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Call Forth the Hound of Bone
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Call Forth the Hound of Bone

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons an undead hound which will hunt your enemies.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Call Forth the Dark One
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Call Forth the Dark One

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons an animated shadow to drain the life from your enemies.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Calling the Lean and Hungry Ones
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Calling the Lean and Hungry Ones

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons a pack of otherworldly hounds to harry your enemies.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Calling the Worms of the Earth
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Calling the Worms of the Earth

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons giant worms which will drag your enemies down into the depths of the earth.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Call Forth the Crawling Ones
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Call Forth the Crawling Ones

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons twisted mockeries of the human form which will grasp and clutch at your enemies.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Call Forth the Living Vortex
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Call Forth the Living Vortex

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons a hole in the air, a swirl of animate winds.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Call Forth that Which Wears the Skins of Men
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Call Forth that Which Wears the Skins of Men

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons a shapeshifting abomination which wears ordinary form until it is close enough for its tentacles and blades to do its deadly work.

name.str: Evocation Grimoire: Call Forth the Hunter from Beyond
name.str_pl: Evocation Grimoires: Call Forth the Hunter from Beyond

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of evocation.  This ritual summons an otherworldly hunter of men.
